subject: Re: I cannot run awtui runner and swingui runner
msgSnippet: Thanks for your reply. ... empty. ... Eclipse,
messageBody:
Thanks for your reply.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "albsavoia" <albsavoia@...> wrote:
>
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "dinesh13284" <dineshkumar.durairaj@>
> wrote:
> >
> > Im very new to JUnit. I just learning through tutorials in the
> > Internet. It is stated that we can run test suites using awtui,
> > swingui, textui runners. But i can run only using textui runner.
> > swingui and awtui folder that ,I extracted from junit4.1.jar is
empty.
> > Can any one explain me how to run tests using awtui and swingui.
> >
>
> Hi Dinesh,
>
> It sounds like you might not be using an IDE. I highly recommend
> downloading an IDE that has built in support for JUnit (e.g.
Eclipse,
> NetBeans - both of which are free).
>
> A good IDE not only makes JUnit running and reporting very easy,
> it also makes writing the tests themselves and refactoring code
> a piece of cake.
>
> Alberto
>
>
> http://www.junitfactory.com
> Generate JUnit tests. Free.
> Send us Java. Get back JUnit.
>
